snippet: The death of Patrick McCusker, a Baltimore restauranteur known as Scunny to friends and acquaintances, galvanized local businesses to support an aspiring professional racer.
abstract: The death of Patrick McCusker, a Baltimore restauranteur known as Scunny to friends and acquaintances, galvanized local businesses to support an aspiring professional racer.

headline.main: In Baltimore, a Rookie Races With a Sizable Fanclub
